\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 30214}

\subsection*{Pain is Managable}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Don}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 3 Tbsp & oral & Lactuca - L. canadensis & dried\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 275.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
As I read these reports, I see a lot of people looking for a buzz!



I suffer chronic neck pain and have had two surgeries with only minimal success.  I've been looking for alternatives to prescription drugs and think I may have hit on something.  I've just finished two cups of tea made with a total of 3 tablespoons of dried plant.  I feel very relaxed and the pain is very managable.  



I am thinking of combining this tea with a cold infusion of kava.  Next time.

\end{document}
